quote: You can actually now put in pictures of a property... and it will look at the pictures and write a description of it.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates a practical use of AI that can save agents time and improve listing quality.
suggested_hook: Struggling with property descriptions? Let AI do the heavy lifting!

quote: When people go the extra mile for you as a client, as a patient, as a guest, you will always remember how they made you feel.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of exceptional client service in real estate.
suggested_hook: Want to leave a lasting impression on your clients? Here's how.
